inclusion.criterion: IPF on LTOT or ambulatory oxygen
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to mobilise for a 6 minute walk test
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Partial pressure of oxygen < 6.0 kilopascals (kPa) or Partial pressure of carbon dioxide > 8kilopascals on air,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Exacerbation of the underlying lung disease in the previous 4 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable cardiovascular disease (e.g. arrhythmia, hypertension/hypotension or angina)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD and is on LTOT. They have a history of atrial septal defect repair, diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD, and COPD on home oxygen.
